page.title: 07Ecology
page.content: {Wildlife:}The main wildlife around the block exists in the small areas of {woodland}and the remaining{hedgerows. {Rabbits}abound and can be a considerable pest so control is practised.The changing{agricultural practices of tearing up hedgerows and the use of{pesticides}have resulted in a diminished wildlife population. This has been realised in recent years and the{devastating effects}of pesticides on the{food chain}resulting in the near{extinction}of hawks and owls has been halted. Some{common creatures}that can be found in the block are Foxes,deer, hedgehogs, rats, mice,weasels,grey squirrels,moles,kestrels,owls,herons and robins.
